moapi.api

Class ModSliderOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • moapi.api.ModOption<java.lang.Float>
      • moapi.api.ModSliderOption

  • public class ModSliderOption
extends ModOption<java.lang.Float>
    Provides an interface to create a simple bounded slider
    Since:
    0.1
